thread.section_title: Life Ionizers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Ionizers | lifeionizers.com
thread.title: Orlando Collado
thread.title_full: Life Ionizers reviewed by Orlando Collado

author: Orlando Collado
title: Orlando Collado
text: We have had the M11 (under counter model) for almost 2 years now and we could not be happier. We have had to replace the filters once do far and the customer service has been excellent for any issues or questions. The UC model looks very clean and we have received numerous compliments on it. I would highly recommend this product as it is the fraction of the cost of other ionizers out there.
